paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician upon Mahalath, Maschil, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician upon Mahalath, Maschil, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: The fool hath said in his heart, There is no God. Corrupt are they, and have done abominable iniquity: there is none that doeth good.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The fool hath said in his heart, There is no God. Corrupt are they, and have done abominable iniquity: there is none that doeth good.

paragraphs.content: God looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, that did seek God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: God looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, that did seek God.

paragraphs.content: Every one of them is gone back: they are altogether become filthy; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Every one of them is gone back: they are altogether become filthy; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.

paragraphs.content: Have the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread: they have not called upon God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Have the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread: they have not called upon God.

paragraphs.content: There were they in great fear, where no fear was: for God hath scattered the bones of him that encampeth against thee: thou hast put them to shame, because God hath despised them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There were they in great fear, where no fear was: for God hath scattered the bones of him that encampeth against thee: thou hast put them to shame, because God hath despised them.

paragraphs.content: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion! When God bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion! When God bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.
